_header: Man look you trust ye not too fele
_description: A reminder of mortality — four couplets

BLHar2316.First Lines: Man loke ȝow troste ȝe nowht to feleȜow ȝw haue gold and werdis wele…
BLHar2316.Last Lines: …Ȝi fleysch schal roten fro ȝe bonbut ȝine dedes schulen wiht ȝe gon
BLHar2316.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.121.
